list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an edible bulb with a pungent taste and smell, composed of several concentric layers, used in cooking.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cook the onion in the oil until lightly colored
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nấu hành tây trong dầu cho đến khi có màu nhẹ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the plant that produces the onion, with long rolled or straplike leaves and spherical heads of greenish-white flowers.
